messages.subject: Responsibility was:Introducing The (grumbly husbands)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/03 5:29:54 PM, fetteroll@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/03 5:29:54 PM, fetteroll@... writes:

<< Think about your husband angrily cleaning up something that seems foolish
to
clean up. >>

My husband does that. Sometimes he dramatically and loudly cleans something
up, while muttering.

But I was gone a week, and he didn't wipe the countertops, and didn't do ANY
laundry.

So I cleaned the countertops extra well, happy to be home, and did LOTS of
laundry. It's still piled on the couch, but its clean!

(Joyce I liked your whole post and I saved it and someday it will be on a
webpage with the Greatest Hits of Thoughts about Chores.)

Sandra
